CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically start TextSecretary when you first power your device.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Custom Response
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This is the message that your recipient will receive when TextSecretary replies for you. In your custom message, enter [end] to have the end time of your event inserted. Similarly, enter [name] to have the name of the your event inserted.

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This enables a minimum time between responses to avoid spamming the recipient.

ListPreference.android:title: Sleep Length
ListPreference.android:summary: Customize the minimum length of time between responses.
